auth.name: Name
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a code to reset your password.
auth.enterResetCodeAndPassword: Enter the code from your email and your new password.
auth.checkEmailForCode: Check your email for a 6-digit code. It will expire in 15 minutes.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

login.title: Stay Connected to Local Events, Not Social Media
login.description: Weekly event newsletter. Curated by you.
login.why1: üö´ No social media browsing ‚Äî avoid the dopamine trap of endless feeds
login.why2: üìß Weekly email only ‚Äî intentional, not addictive. You get events for the month ahead, so you have time to plan
login.why3: ‚úÇÔ∏è Curated for you ‚Äî we filter events so you don't waste time sifting through everything
login.failure1: ‚úÖ You see events you genuinely want to attend
login.failure2: ‚úÖ The list is short enough that you don't feel like you're "discovering" or browsing

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: Set your preferences (interests, genres, venues, artists) in Preferences.
gettingStarted.step3: Generate your first newsletter to see what events we find for you!

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Manage your preferences to get personalized event recommendations.

preferencesSection.title: 1. Enter Your Preferences
preferencesSection.description: Add your interests, genres, venues, artists, and other preferences to get personalized event recommendations.

eventSources.title: 2. Enter Links for Event Postings
eventSources.description: Add URLs to venues or event providers you normally follow. These will be checked for events in your newsletter.

onboarding.intro: Let's get you set up. Add your interests, genres, venues, artists, and other preferences below. You can always edit preferences later, and you'll rarely need to update them‚Äîset it once and you're done.
onboarding.step2Description: Generate a sample newsletter to see what kind of events we'll find for you.

newsletters.title: Newsletters
newsletters.subject: Subject
newsletters.noNewsletters: No newsletters yet. Generate your first one!
